Verses: 1 adharku Yobu Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 ippadippatta Anegan Kaariyangalai Naan Kettirukkiren; Neengal Ellaarum Alattundaakkugira Thetraravaalar.
3 kaatraippondra Vaarththaigalukku Mudiviraadho? Ippadi Nee Uththaravusolla Unakkuth Thunivu Undaanadhenna?
4 ungalaippola Naanum Pesakkoodum; Naan Irukkum Nilaimaiyil Neengal Irundhaal, Naan Ungalukku Virodhamaaga Vaarththaigalaik Korththu, Ungalukku Edhire En Thalaiyaith Thulukkavunkoodum.
5 aanaalum Naan En Vaayinaal Ungalukkuth Thidan Solluven; En Udhadugalin Asaivu Ungal Dhukkaththai Aatrum.
6 naan Pesinaalum En Dhukkam Aaraadhu; Naan Pesaamalirundhaalum Enakku Enna Aarudhal?
7 ippodhu Avar Ennai Ilaiththuppoga Seydhaar; En Koottaththaiyellaam Paazhaakkineer.
8 neer Ennai Surungippogappanninadhu Adharku Saatchi; En Melivu Ennil Aththaatchiyaaga Nindru, En Mugaththukku Munbaaga Uththaravu Sollum.
9 ennaip Pagaikkiravanudaiya Kobam Ennaip Peerugiradhu, Enperil Parkadikkiraan; En Saththuru Kodiya Kanninaal Ennaip Paarkkiraan.
10 enakku Virodhamaagath Thangal Vaayai Virivaaith Thirandhaargal; Nindhaiyaaga Ennaik Kannaththil Adiththaargal; Enakku Virodhamaaga Egamaaik Koottankoodinaargal.
11 dhevan Ennai Aniyaayakkaaran Vasamaaga Oppuviththu, Dhunmaarkkarin Kaiyil Ennai Adappadappanninaar.
12 naan Sugamaai Vaazhndhirundhen; Avar Ennai Narukki, En Pidariyaip Pidiththu, Ennai Norukki, Ennaith Thamakku Lakkaaga Niruththinaar.
13 avarudaiya Villaalar Ennai Soozhndhukondaargal; En Eeralaith Thappavidaamal Pilandhaar; En Pichchaith Tharaiyil Ootrivittaar.
14 norukkudhalinmel Norukkudhalai Enmel Varappanninaar; Paraakkiramasaaliyaippola Enmel Paaindhaar.
15 naan Rattuchchelaiyaith Thaiththu, En Tholinmel Porththukkonden; En Magimaiyaip Puzhudhiyile Pottuvitten.
16 azhugiradhinaal En Mugam Azhukkadaindhadhu; Marana Irul En Kannimaigalinmel Undaayirukkiradhu.
17 en Kaigalile Kodumaiyillaadhirukkaiyilum, En Jebam Suththamaayirukkaiyilum, Appadiyaayitru.
18 boomiye, En Raththaththai Moodippodaadhe; En Alarudhalukku Maraividam Undaagaadhiruppadhaaga.
19 ippodhum Idho, En Saatchi Paralogaththilirukkiradhu, Enakku Saatchi Pagarugiravar Unnadhangalil Irukkiraar.
20 en Snegidhar Ennaip Pariyaasampannugiraargal; En Kan Dhevanai Nokkik Kanneer Sorigiradhu.
21 oru Manupuththiran Than Snegidhanukkaaga Vazhakkaadugiradhupola, Dhevanode Manushanukkaaga Vazhakkaadugiravar Oruvar Undaanaal Nalamaayirukkum.
22 kurugina Varushangalukku Mudivu Varugiradhu; Naan Thirumbivaraadha Vazhiye Poven.
